title: The Mystery on Horseshoe Drive
description: In this Dateline classic, a man is shot and killed while picking up his daughter for a court-ordered visit. Rob Stafford reports. Originally aired on NBC on October 8, 2010.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
